main event: An object larger than a T-33 jet was observed flying erratically in the southern sky near Rossville, Oklahoma on January 14, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as being 7 or 8 times larger than a T-33 jet,It emitted bright white and red lights,The sighting lasted approximately 12 minutes,The object hovered motionless at times and moved erratically,This was the third sighting of a similar object in the area within two weeks.
witness description: The observer was on duty at the Command Post.
